scripts.postinstall: if [[ -z "$CI" || -n "$FIREBASE_TOOLS" ]]; then bun install --global firebase-tools@13.34.0; fi;
scripts.cleanup: rm -rf lib && rm -rf src/api/__generated__ && bun graphql:gen && bun tsc
scripts.dev: firebase emulators:exec --import .emulators --ui --only functions,firestore 'curl GET http://127.0.0.1:5001/price-it-85b3e/europe-west3/system-migration && bun graphql:gen -w src/**/graphql/* & bun tsc --watch'
scripts.test:all: bun test:unit && bun test:int && bun test:feat
